name: CMC Software Solution
description:
CMCSoftware was founded in 1996 and has become one of Vietnam’s top 5 software companies with more than 300 employees. We have delivered high quality software development & services such as: Mobile application, Web Application & eCommerce, BPO, Data Entry & Processing, ERP Consulting & Implementation and many others.
We also pride ourselves on our extensive experience in various domains, namely Government and Public, Banking & Finance, Insurance, Securities, Education, Telecom, Transportation and Utilities. With a strong desire to develop internationally, we are striving in every possible way to acquire new partners/clients, and more importantly we try to strengthen the relationship by satisfying their high requirements. Certifications: ISO 9001:2008, ISO 27001, CMMi level 3 Our customers: EU, USA, Asia
